verbs: So say we all... reluctantly
All of this has happened before... and we learned nothing
And all of this will happen again... unfortunately
By your command... I guess
Spinning up FTL drives... again
Jump coordinates calculated... probably wrong
Prepare to jump... into more problems
Action stations! ...here we go again
Set condition one... it's always condition one
Dradis contact... it's never good news
Launch alert vipers... for all the good it'll do
Rolling the hard six... because nothing is easy
What do you hear? Nothing but complaints
Nothing but the rain... and tears
Grab your gun... you'll need it
The Cylons were created by man... our mistake
They have a plan... we don't
There must be some way out of here (there isn't)
Life here began out there... should've stayed there
The fleet is assembled... barely
33 minutes... of suffering
Frak... just frak
So say we all (sigh)
Jump complete. Lost another ship
Finding Earth... any day now (it's been years)
